text: [Music]
hi I'm Matt and I'm one of the
curriculum managers here at AWS and I
also hold multiple AWS associate
professional and specialty
certifications these exams validate
technical expertise certification helps
you gain recognition and visibility for
your skills and allows companies to
identify skilled cloud talent the
training and certification team gets a
lot of questions about how to best
prepare for an AWS certification exam
the best preparation is practical
experience but we also offer training
and materials to help you we've worked
on developing new exam readiness
training courses to help you prepare to
take an associate professional or
specialty exam at AWS we think about
exam preparation a little differently we
want to help you understand the
mechanics of passing an exam and teach
you test taking strategies to help you
succeed we teach you how to interpret
exam questions apply concepts being
tested by the exam and allocate your
study time you'll also have a chance to
work through sample questions to
understand the rationale behind correct
and incorrect answer choices
finally we help you identify any areas
where you might need additional work and
study before taking the exam of course
our training is developed by AWS and
taught by accredited instructors who
have personal experience passing AWS
certification exams
you can be confident that our courses
are current with the exam best practices
search for a public class near you at
AWS stop training or contact us for
private on-site training for your team
good luck
you
